meta.script: window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {}; window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1; // 0 = don't load anything, // 1 = only load visible elements, // 2 = load also very near view elements (expand option) // 3 = load also not so near view elements (expand * expFactor option)

window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {}; window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1; // 0 = don't load anything, // 1 = only load visible elements, // 2 = load also very near view elements (expand option) // 3 = load also not so near view elements (expand * expFactor option)
